sense.name: separate (as if) by passing through a sieve
sense.examples: Sift the flower into the liquid mixture. The soldiers sifted through the wooods.

sense.name: sort carefully and/or separate out
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1[agent] SIFT PP[through/out] NP2[abstract]
sense.examples: I haven't really sifted through the stats. Do you want juicy celebrity gossip that I've sifted out of the Blogosphere? The CEO sifted through all the job applications for the VP position. Police sift through the past for secrets.
